_comment_start: RESONANT · ARTIST METRICS EXPORT — v1.0 | Aggregated · Read-only · Pitch-safe

meta.description: Aggregated artist-level listening metrics derived exclusively from intentional listening sessions.

methodology.sessionQualification: Sessions are included only if intentional listening thresholds are met.
methodology.timeNormalization: All durations are expressed in milliseconds.
methodology.resonanceDefinition: Dominant listening time band for the artist.

notes: This file contains no executable logic.
Safe for sponsors, partners, and public sharing.
Designed to be backend- and BI-compatible.
